name: conductor-node
description: Easily integrate the entire QuickBooks Desktop API using fully-typed async TypeScript
author: Conductor <support@conductor.is>

scripts.prepack: yarn --silent tsc && yarn --silent delete-compiled-dev-files && yarn --silent tsc-alias
scripts.diff: yarn pack && npm diff --diff=conductor-node@latest --diff=conductor-node-v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version").tgz && yarn clean
